评论概述: Fun and Warm But Poor Quality
评论详情: This sweater is fun and cheerful to wear.  It is bulky and very warm.  The sleeves are really long, but the body is too short.  The quality isn't great - the colored yarn used for the flowers bleeds through creating faint colored stripes where the flowers are.  This isn't that noticable from a distance but is obvious up close.So it's fun to throw on to run errands or such, but I wouldn't wear it to gatherings.
Very comfortable sweater, perfect for winter.

This is my new favorite sweater! It is very comfortable and roomy. It's made of good quality material to keep you warm while still looking stylish. I have the white and black simple colored pattern that can go well with jeans or a nice skirt. It's the perfect sweater to add to your winter wardrobe!
Bleh this was not as nice! I’m returning!

Beautiful pattern. I get so many compliments when I wear this sweater. It's very warm. Nice quality knit. Great for any occasion from church to ski lodge. Fits perfectly. Nice weight. Soft but not extremely soft. Comfortable.
Really adorable knit sweater. Get it in a few sizes up as it will shrink and make you feel worse about your New Year’s resolution. It comfy but not very thick or warm

Although this has a very nice print… and the fabric is great… I wanted it oversized like the photo showed… but it was really short on my arms. I’m 5’9 and 128 lbs and ordered the small. Will have to go up a size.

I love this sweater, it fits great and is thick yet breathable. The color and pattern is beautiful and the quality is superb!!! I can’t recommend this sweater enough and I would definitely buy it in different colors. It’s so unique looking and I feel great when I wear it!!!!

评论概述: Very warm, but a wee short
评论详情: I love the warm feel of this jumper, but it is meant for someone smaller. It runs a little short, but I still think it's cute

Very nice sweater, It's thick and warm. Well made and pretty! My family loved it and asked where I got it because now they want it too! Perfect to wear to a dinner party or under a coat or jacket. I've been wearing it all the time. Definitely recommend it!!
This sweater is super cute and very warm. The material is very soft and good quality. It’s not heavy, but is definitely thick enough to keep you warm. I ordered an XL and it fits me very well.

I ordered this purely for the look of it. I loved how vintage it was, but I am shocked at how nice it is! It is a heavier sweater, not cheaply made at all! The knitting of it is tight and you can tell that is made with care. It fits great, cropped fit with looser sleeves. I am very impressed with this sweater for the price and it will stay in my wardrobe for years to come!
I was instantly smitten with the cute design and gorgeous colors of this sweater! It is soft, warm, non-itchy, and has no irritating neck tags inside.

To start with, the flowers look nothing like the image in the listing. Next, the colors of the yarn are streaking across the back of image and show through quite clearly. Then, it is far shorter than shown. Finally, the weave is very loose and pulls easily. The plus is that is warm. I was highly disappointed.

Daughter is very pleased with this sweater. It looks good on her and she likes the design. It's soft, not itchy, and is flattering. Looks exactly as pictured and sized correctly. So, if you're a M and you order the M, it should fit as shown here.  Washes easily and dries well with no pilling yet.
I wasn’t expecting to like this as much as I do. The colors are great love the way it feels on. Fabric is great quality. Size is perfect
The sweater looks just as pictured, however, it is super wide. It’s supposed to be oversized, but definitely has a chunky look to it. Soft material, thick with beautiful coloring.
Cozy winter sweater, perfect for cold days. Easy to pair with leggings or jeans. I ordered a small and it still feels a little oversized, I would recommend sizing down if on the fence.

I got this to be an oversized sweater. It's cute for the holidays. The thickness is great, it's heavy and warm, and the material is a nice quality. I think it's a little more comfy with a tank top underneath just because the type of material is kind of like wool.

评论概述: Much heavier then I was expecting
评论详情: A thick, soft, warm sweater. Much better quality then I expected, also.

评论概述: So soft, love the colors and design
评论详情: Soft ✔️ cute ✔️ colorful ✔️ and the fit is perfect for that oversized sweater look. Be careful to not pick it like I did with my bracelet as soon as I unpacked it. Do note that in certain lighting, you can see through the white and blue parts to see the pink and red yarn. It doesn’t bother me but I know some people it might, so maybe get one of the darker shades to avoid that. I even love the print of the inside of the sweater.

This sweater is very thick and soft. It will keep you warm for sure. I ordered a size larger than my normal size since it has a slightly cropped style to it; I'm glad I did because the next size up fits great. It looks just like the picture.

My wife loves this sweater. It is a bit thinker and warm so if you live it a warmer climate this may not be the best for you. My wife is typically an XL size 14-16 and this fits a little big for her. So if you are inbetween sizes I would recommend sizing down.
Very different than expected from the photos. The material is extremely different. It is soft but thick. It’s very short and runs very small.
The sweater did not look like the picture. It looks very cheap.

super soft, super warm, looks just like the picture! the length is perfect so it feels like an oversized sweater without looking like it’s too big. AND the stitches are so pretty and the color pops beautifully!! 6/5 stars, i will be buying more in different colors

评论概述: Not as cute as the picture
评论详情: Poor quality and not soft. Actually pretty ugly
